meanings.sent1: Her unartful painting showed a lack of experience.
meanings.sent2: The unartful drawing looked like it was done by a beginner.
meanings.sent3: Despite her best efforts, the unartful masterpiece made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The unartful sculpture seemed to melt into a blob of clay.
meanings.sent5: The unartful performance left the audience unimpressed and bored.

meanings.sent1: His unartful plan to sneak out failed miserably.
meanings.sent2: The unartful excuse he gave was easily seen through.
meanings.sent3: In a moment of unartful honesty, he revealed his true intentions.
meanings.sent4: The unartful scheme crumbled like a house of cards.
meanings.sent5: Her unartful attempt at deception fooled no one.
